# Instant Messaging Services

**API Collection**

The predefined constants are used to identify instant messaging services.

## Overview

You may use these constants or any other string.

## Constants

- **kABInstantMessageServiceAIM**: AOL Instant Messenger instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceFacebook**: Facebook instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceGaduGadu**: Gadu-Gadu instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceGoogleTalk**: Google Talk instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceICQ**: ICQ instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceJabber**: Jabber instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceMSN**: MSN instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceQQ**: QQ instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceSkype**: Skype instant message service.
- **kABInstantMessageServiceYahoo**: Yahoo! instant message service.

## Social Media Constants

- **Instant Messaging Keys**: The keys used to specify the different fields in a [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/kABInstantMessageProperty] property.
- **Social Profile Services**: The predefined constants are used to identify social networking services.
